speaker: char
text: Greetings, good soul! The date didn’t go well again, I’m afraid. I looked the part but I must admit, my heart really wasn’t in the rest of it.

speaker: char
text: We didn’t have any chance to talk and I lost all the races no matter how hard I tried to keep up.

speaker: char
text: I’m beginning to think I’m doing something wrong. It surely must be me. Maybe I’m just not trying hard enough.

speaker: char
text: This next person didn’t really show any preferences for my look so I was thinking. I really liked the colors of the first look and the piercings from the second one, could you somehow combine them together?
